mapper.select: SELECT lwi.`item`, li.item_name, li.item_desc, SUM(lwi.`receive`) zs, sy.us, ( IFNULL(SUM(lwi.`receive`), 0) - IFNULL(sy.us, 0) ) kc, ibr.balance_up, ibr.balance_down FROM ly_workshop_inventory lwi LEFT JOIN ( SELECT lsa.item, SUM(lsa.`use_num`) us FROM ly_sfc_assembly lsa WHERE lsa.site = #{site} GROUP BY lsa.`item` ) sy ON lwi.`item` = sy.item LEFT JOIN ly_item_bom_relation ibr ON lwi.item = ibr.item_no LEFT JOIN ly_item li ON li.item_no = lwi.item WHERE lwi.site = #{site} AND ibr.site = #{site} AND li.site = #{site} GROUP BY lwi.item UNION ALL ( SELECT lwi.item, li.item_name, li.item_desc, SUM(lwi.`receive`) zs, 0 us, SUM(lwi.`receive`) kc, ibr.balance_up, ibr.balance_down FROM ly_workshop_inventory lwi LEFT JOIN ly_item li ON li.item_no = lwi.item AND li.site = #{site} LEFT JOIN ly_item_bom_relation ibr ON lwi.item = ibr.item_no AND ibr.site = #{site} WHERE lwi.item NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT item FROM ly_sfc_assembly ) AND li.site = #{site} AND li.item_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY lwi.item )
